thread.section_title: HDIS Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HDIS | www.hdis.com | 5 of 112
thread.title: Madeline

author: Madeline
title: Madeline
text: Since I just "graduated" to disposable underware, I'm still dealing with the emotional side of this. Service has been great and I'm pleased with the quality, though I do have a slight issue with the fit. As I really didn't know what to expect, I plan to try a different brand next time to see if I like it better. BUT at least I no longer have to worry about embarrassing myself in public!
